Description: Uneo Health's digital health platform, Prosper, simplifies engagement between mental health clinics and their patients.
Full Description: The Uneo app, Prosper, was launched with an important mission - to provide a simple wellness hub for the 10s of millions of teens and young adults to manage and improve their mind and body while also connecting them with their behavioral health provider and other resources. Recent years have underscored the the importance for society to start focusing on this population while they are still young as emerging life-long mental and physical health challenges begin early and create the trajectory for larger issues later in life.  We launched an engaging, personalized, and secure experience inspired and built by Generation Z and Millennials. The underlying Uneo platform, Prosper Connect, provides a convenient way for behavioral health clinics to support their patients ("clients") with cognitive behavioral health self-care support, wellness messages, and appointment reminders.  Clinics, already struggling with resources, benefit from improved patient retention and a reduction in patient 'no shows'. Prosper provides a gamified, personalized approach that supports the significant health equity challenges that exist especially for those in underserved communities.  With partnerships including NEDA, NAMI, and FindHelp, opportunities to provide expanded resources and tools to address these health issues and social determinant drivers are now available to Gen Z and Millennial youth.

With a commitment to redefining the landscape of VC fund management and startup success, DealAnswer.com offers tailored solutions that streamline operations, ensure compliance, and elevate performance for VCs. Our comprehensive suite of services for venture capitalists includes: SPV Management: Simplify the creation and management of Special Purpose Vehicles (SPVs) with expert guidance. Fund Administration: Benefit from our full-service solutions, addressing the complexities of fund operations effectively. Series LLC: Utilize our expertise in Series LLC formation and management, ensuring flexibility and protection for your fund's investments. Accounting & Tax Filing: Rely on our comprehensive accounting services and tax filing expertise to maintain financial integrity and compliance. Series as a Service: Leverage our innovative 'Series as a Service' offering, designed to facilitate the structuring and management of series investments within your fund. Investor Updates: Enhance communication with your investors through regular, informative updates, keeping them engaged and informed. Limited Partnership Management: Streamline the management of limited partnerships, simplifying complex agreements and operations. Website Development and Branding: Elevate your online presence with our website development and branding services, crafting a digital identity that resonates with your target audience. Offshore Fund Services: Expand your reach and explore offshore fund options with our expertise and support. For startups, DealAnswer.com is a trusted partner, providing comprehensive services that prepare them for investment. Our offerings include financial infrastructure setup, and assistance beyond tax filing, equipping startups with essential tools for growth and investment readiness. At DealAnswer.com, we combine deep industry expertise with innovative technology, ensuring that VCs and startups have access to customized support that evolves in tandem with the dynamic venture capital market. Join us in shaping the future of venture capital management and startup growth.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Lending and Investments, Professional Services

Description: UPRETS is a real estate digital securitization platform.
Full Description: UPRETS is a platform focused on simplifying investment in real estate. We are dedicated to providing a convenient, compliant and advanced real estate digital securitization platform for property developers, asset owners and investors globally. By utilizing UPRETS platform, real estate developers and assets owners can create digital securities for their properties, allowing investors to benefit from the rental dividends and capital appreciation of the properties in major global cities. Backed by a publicly listed real estate conglomerate (NYSE:XIN) and our award-winning, patented blockchain technology, Xbolt, we bring a network, experience and luxury assets to the platform. What distinguishes UPRETS from other tokenization platforms is our global real estate partnership network that we built through the decades. Our 5 oversea subsidiaries with 22 operating offices represent an unprecedented effort in real estate tokenization. With regard to portfolio management, UPRETS tokenization platform will revolutionize how investors get access to high-quality and well-diversified real estate assets across the world. We had already lined up a considerable amount of real estate projects to be tokenized, including some of the most iconic landmarks. Following the Chinese Central Bank and Alibaba group, we are ranked as the 3rd most advanced blockchain institution in the Chinese blockchain industrial by patented counts. UPRETS is among the first five companies that were certified by the Chinese government as the officially authorized blockchain service provider. UPRETS.io started to develop its own consortium chain Technology dated back in 2015. As one of the most matured blockchain firms in China, our consortium chain solution had already established 22 successful cases in multiple fields including insurance, real estate, logistic, social network.

Continuously looking to steamroll through the human resource barriers faced by hiring managers each day, Valilly has the means and drive to push the boundaries of Talent Intelligence innovation to heretofore unrealized new heights.  For all those companies that have been expending large resources to find the talent that they need, to then dishearteningly come away with unsatisfactory returns, Valilly’s Talent Intelligence is the safety net to their needlessly depreciating values. For all those hiring managers that have spent a myriad number of hours seeking that desperately needed employee to turn around their company, tapping into Valilly’s Talent Intelligence allows them to better allocate and manage their own time, as well as the efforts of their subordinates, in securing needed resources. For all those that have been disappointed by the lack of talent management tools offered by the applicant tracking systems and talent software solutions currently on the market, Valilly provides the medicine to cure them of their frustrations. Users do not need to upgrade their plans just to make their lives easier. And of course, you can easily invite your teammates and manage your work together, there is no per seat charge. DogQ will appeal to both experienced web developers and absolute beginners. Moreover, DogQ was designed for people without a specific technical background. With a general idea of how a website or a web app should function you can undoubtedly use DogQ. As for skilled developers, DogQ enables users to build automated test scenarios for UI, e2e, regression, functional, and other types of web testing. Description: Timeless is a calendar as a service marketplace — to match people's time and services.
Full Description: The order of time is predictably linear, yet the order of life events unpredictably occurs with entwined complexity. While conventional calendars provide time management features, they do little to realize the value of time. Our vision is to organize time & make it meaningful. By fusing calendar events with real-world semantic knowledge, we can develop a web-scale graph that collates all the facts about people, places, and events. We call this the Time Graph. This computational breakthrough of organizing the web as things, not strings, was first achieved with the introduction of the Google Knowledge Graph. By applying similar ML techniques, we can explore the world as made up of things, and we can experience the world as made up of events — of happenings. In our everyday happenings, we carry on tasks — forging relationships, indulging curiosities, pursuing purpose and happiness — all within a ticking clock. It's why, as time charges forward, it can feel like we have limited control over the use of our time. We give too much time to tasks that should take less time, and not enough on activities that give our hearts joy. Why does a Monday DMV visit feel it drags on forever, and a Sunday brunch spent with closest friends too short? Because the conventional calendar treats the physical flow of time as constant, its value unchanging and independent of any external context. It is why we are developing Timeless calendar to enrich each event with its own meaning and value relative to the vantage of the observer. Or philosophically, time is indexical, as the value of time can be measured only in relation to the context in which it occurs. Our philosophical rumination on the meaning of time is a reflection of our own challenges of organizing time. Intuitively we feel our experience of time and events is complex and filled with personal idiosyncrasies. In our lifetime, we make millions of time-event decisions from small to big: when to wake up, when to eat, when to meet with friends and families, when to exercise, how much to sleep, when to take a vacation. While we can work harder to earn more money, it is impossible to earn more time. So we use time-saving services or get help when we lack the necessary qualifications to perform specific tasks. The Internet provides improvements in the retailing of goods through increased speed, convenience, and large inventory. Amazon made it possible to instantly fulfill millions of orders with a click of a button. We believe we can achieve the same economic value for millions of service providers and billions of service customers. The calendar is the de-facto time management tools to match people’s time & services. Our business plan is to build a calendar as a service marketplace to help us save time — by getting helpful services with a tap of a button.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast

Description: Making sustainability easy and accessible by recycling polyurethane manufacturing waste and skate wheels back into useful outdoor products
Full Description: Shred Cycle Inc. is a company that makes sustainability easy and accessible to action sports enthusiasts and manufacturers by upcycling polyurethane waste, from skateboarding wheels and manufacturing waste, back  into useful outdoor products. We collect, upcycle, and recycle old skateboarding and roller skate wheels and use this material as filler for  products in the outdoor and action sports industry. Skaters can use our paid website service to send in their  used skate wheels, and we ensure that good wheels go back to the community through our nonprofit  partnership with Bridge-to-Skate. Unusable wheels and post-manufacturing wheel waste go through our  upcycling or recycling process where they are either sold to be upcycled into creative uses or are shredded  down to create materials for new products. We engage our 50k+ active user base and community on social  media through content focused on sustainability and action sports, and we source ideas for new products and  affiliate partnerships. Our goal is to make sustainability easy and accessible and ultimately have a lasting  impact by closing the loop on polyurethane waste!
Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Sustainability

Description: AI-powered farm management for enhanced productivity and sustainable agriculture.
Full Description: Smart Farm Tools is a pioneer in the agricultural sector, leveraging state-of-the-art artificial intelligence (AI) to revolutionize farm management. Our comprehensive AI-driven platform is designed to enhance agricultural productivity by offering real-time insights, aiding in smarter decision-making and efficient resource management. The platform's predictive analytics capability empowers farmers with forecasts on crop yields, pest risks, and the best planting and harvesting times. With the integration of IoT, Smart Farm Tools enables remote monitoring and control of farm operations, bringing convenience and efficiency to the forefront. We place a strong emphasis on sustainable farming practices, providing tools and insights that encourage environmentally friendly methods. Our solutions are customized to meet the diverse needs of various farming operations, ensuring that each farm benefits from tailored strategies that boost both yield and sustainability. The platform is user-friendly, making sophisticated technology accessible and easy to use for farmers. Our impact is evident through significant increases in crop yields, operational cost reductions, and contributions to environmental conservation via sustainable practices. Looking ahead, Smart Farm Tools is dedicated to ongoing innovation. We are continuously exploring new technologies like machine learning and advanced sensor tech to further refine our offerings, with the aim of leading the agricultural sector towards a more efficient and sustainable future. For farmers and agricultural businesses looking to embrace the future of farming, Smart Farm Tools offers the ideal partnership, blending technology with agricultural expertise to pave the way for a more prosperous and environmentally conscious farming landscape.
Headquarters Regions: West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Software

It’s a cheaper mode of entertainment comparing traditional cinema hall with no parking charges as well at this pandemic situation audience will be safe and enjoy the quality time.   A drive-in-cinema is a form of cinema structure consisting of a large outdoor movie screen. it is an open theatre where visitors can take his / her cars inside and watch the movie,  as well as visitors who don't bring any car can also enjoy the movie seating in the garden and gallery along with a shopping mall, food court  and game zone for kids under one roof. Planning to start the project in 2021 and target to operational by 2024 I am looking forward to you.

Description: Next generation therapeutics based on exosomes
Full Description: Problem: About 20% of the population in the United States suffers from a diagnosable mental illness. Brain disorder therapeutics is a ~$100B market with just 50% patient reach and poised to grow at a rapid rate. Despite huge market and unmet need, the drugs targeting brain disorders range from ineffective to partially effective and treat symptoms rather than altering the course of disease. Solution: Exosomes are transportation and logistics services of the body that carry biomolecules to specific cellular targets and have capability to heal the defective cells and tissues. We harness the targeting capability of exosomes to improve the efficacy of current drugs and healing capability of exosomes to usher a new era of therapeutics for the brain disorders.

Industries: CleanTech, Consumer Electronics, Energy Efficiency, Hotel, Intelligent Systems, Mechanical Engineering, Outdoors, Restaurants
Description: The World’s First Intelligent outdoor portable climate controller
Full Description: The modern push for environmentally-conscience devices, spurred on by consumer demand and government regulation, has forced companies to either adapt or die. As early as 2008, the UK was considering a ban on patio heaters, with an estimated economic impact in the UK alone of up to 250M euros in lost revenue per year to the pubs, restaurants, and caterers that depend on them. Armita-X is disrupting the entire outdoor space heating industry by making use of our most current understanding of thermodynamics and modern computing to more efficiently generate heat- saving gas, money, and the environment. Our patented technology will be the first to bridge the gap between outdated mechanical devices and modern, intelligent, energy-conscience devices. Armita-X is a marvel in thermodynamic efficiency: Capturing waste in the form excess heat, the unit is able to generate its own electricity. Equipped with wireless networking, even multiple units are easy to control from the palm of your hand. Both the smartphone application and the touchscreen panel on the device provide information regarding the level of propane gas remaining, the duration until the propane gas cylinders need to be exchanged, battery levels, and temperature control options. In addition, the unit is smart enough to automatically power down when a leakage is detected. Ultimately, we envision Armita-X as a modular platform rather than a simple device. Based on needs addressed by customer discovery, we’ve already added the option to add lights, a touchscreen, and speakers, amongst others. Each Armita-X can be customized to match the particular needs of the end-user. A sleek aluminum casing encloses heating elements that better utilize propane gas, generating longer heating periods per unit of gas, and making use of the entire tank. Efficient design incorporates three different heat sources: while the first element helps generate heat quickly, the third element helps retain heat, striking a balance that allows for fast start-up and longer sustained heating periods.  Using proximity sensors, Armita-X knows when to turn on and off, minimizing waste. Pressure sensors remove the guess-work of how much gas is left in the tanks, meaning you’ll no longer effectively throw your money away when disposing of tanks that still have leftover gas. our target market are residential( backyards) and commercial (restaurants,hotels, cafe's, bar's ,outdoor events and parties and etc).
Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Consumer Electronics, Data and Analytics, Energy, Food and Beverage, Hardware, Science and Engineering, Sports, Sustainability, Travel and Tourism

Description: govWorks in an innovator in simplifying government services for the public.
Full Description: govWorks expedites the government application process by using a turnkey platform. Its sophisticated online wizard is integrated into every step of the application process navigating civilians through a variety of conditional questions that if answered incorrectly can cause delays in their application for items such as passports, licenses, and travel visas. In an ever-changing geopolitical landscape, all governments, both local and foreign are constantly changing and govWorks stays up-to-date on this shifting environment, always delivering our customers with the most up-to-date information. The govWorks intuitive web platform that brings simplicity to complex bureaucratic processes. The platform makes filling out documents and applications easier and greatly reduces common application errors. In doing so, the company aims to create a public benefit by providing a secure and seamless process while helping to reduce the burden on government officials who will no longer have to deal with incomplete applications leading to additional work which ultimately cost taxpayers. Founder and CEO Adam Boalt is a serial entrepreneur who previously founded RushMyPassport.com and LiveAnswer.com in the past 5 years. He sold LiveAnswer.com to the publicly-traded S&P 500 and Fortune 1000 company, Stericycle. Boalt participated in Washington, D.C.’s Open Data Initiative to promote transparency in government and was awarded first place in an Innovation Contest by former President Barack Obama's CIO, Vivek Kundra. Shortly thereafter, Boalt was invited to speak at the World Bank's Open Data Summit. NOTE: govWorks was launched in January 2018 and is not related to the govWorks founded in 1999. The main difference between the two companies is that that the new govWorks is starting at the Federal government and with foreign governments. They are headed downstream tackling state and local governments next, whereas the original govWorks went upstream starting at the municipalities and the company was way ahead of their time and governments weren't ready to to support the technology integration.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Miami Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Government and Military

Description: Defending the world from cybersecurity threats through continuous compliance.
Full Description: Our Mission Defending the world from cybersecurity threats through continuous compliance. Our monthly engagement model delivers a robust cybersecurity program that allows you to meet compliance frameworks, including SOC 2, HIPAA, and CMMC.  Once compliance certification is achieved, we constantly enhance your security program to keep up with the evolving threat landscape and compliance standards. Our compliance automation toolset gives you complete visibility into your compliance status while saving you time and money. Our monthly service offering includes: •	Continuous Cybersecurity Compliance: Our team of CISSP and CISA-certified security experts will develop and execute a cybersecurity plan to meet compliance frameworks. Our continuous compliance service includes: o	Gap Analysis o	Risk Assessment o	Policy Generation and Implementation o	Business Continuity Planning o	Remediation o	Certification Assistance •	Managed Compliance Automation: Automate your compliance journey with a single platform for all your frameworks that allows you to continuously monitor your compliance status. •	Managed Security Awareness and Phishing: Security awareness training modules and AI-driven phishing tests with reporting and progress monitoring. •	vCISO: Our experienced and certified vCISO’s work with your team through every phase of the compliance journey to ensure your security program is tailored to your unique business requirements. Who we serve: Small & Medium Enterprise: We are the security and compliance experts, so you don’t have to be. Our continuous compliance service is crafted to meet the needs and budgets of startups and small to medium enterprises. Managed Service Providers: We are a team of managed service experts.  We’ve founded, managed, grown, and sold MSPs. We focus on achieving compliance for your managed service offering so you can focus on expanding your customer base. SaaS: SOC 2 compliance is a must for many SaaS providers. We leverage industry-relevant security controls to achieve compliance for your service with tools built in the cloud to drive automation.

Description: eAuditor is an inspection, issue capture and corrective action (CAPA) platform.
Full Description: 1. It all starts with a checklist template Digitize your existing checklists 2. Conduct an inspection anywhere on your mobile device eAuditor makes it easy for anyone in your team to conduct inspections and audits on the go and records your audit results while you're in the field. 3. Export and share professional reports Instantly generate a report after an inspection is complete. Share it with your team, managers, clients or customers with the tap of a finger. 4. Gain insights with analytics Automatic syncing between mobile devices and desktop platform provide real-time analytics dashboards. Get visibility into your productivity, compliance, accuracy and more. Reducing Total Cost of Ownership It's a tough question that every company faces - how do you ensure quality and reliability while reducing costs? The answer: Reduce your total cost of ownership. Issues like breakage and delamination can result in costly recalls. By selecting the proper quality systems for your products early in the development process, you may be able to avoid these issues. Through early partnerships, eAuditor can help manage the cost of ownership through: Lifecycle management Integrated containment and delivery Technical expertise eAuditor is quality and safety inspection software system (QMS) to improve field audit productivity, consistency, visibility, organizational efficiency and collaboration by managing quality processes in a single application for employees and auditors. Mobile audits performed by eAuditor are stored in cloud-based database for expanded management reporting and analysis. eAuditor takes productivity the extra mile with pre-built integrations and custom enterprise system integration services. eAuditor provides a comprehensive solution for managing compliance, risk, quality. eAuditor software streamlines audit-related tasks which include creating standardized audit and checklist templates, generating an audit plan, conducting audits, identifying non-conformances and recommendations, tracking CAPAs and reporting results. eAuditor provides workflows and process management, controls processes and verifies their effectiveness with a single integrated quality management system. Additional capabilities include features and tools for audits, analytics, and validation, flexibility and automation of audit planning and generate customizable template-based audit reports. eAuditor is used by retail chains, hospitality brands, manufacturers, construction companies, health & safety inspectors, logistics, healthcare and many other industries. Real-time inspections & visibility, improved standards & compliance are the biggest benefits of eAuditor.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
